promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple frilled-lizard fighting-type pokemon wearing dark gemstones. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemguise, a a gigantic simple frilled-lizard fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Eruption Shot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "fighting" or "Gemguise". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: With a body gleaming like jewels, this colossal arena dweller can blast a heated eruption from its scales. Its decorative neck frill intimidates foes.
